headline: Does BMO’s Downgrade Reframe Brown & Brown’s (BRO) Acquisition-Driven Growth Story?
summary: In late December, BMO Capital downgraded Brown & Brown, Inc. to Market Perform, citing concerns that consensus expectations for the company’s organic growth in 2026 may drift lower and weigh on sentiment, even as the business has previously reported solid organic revenue and long-term EPS expansion. At the same time, Brown & Brown has continued to expand through acquisitions such as Shoemaker & Besser Associates and the J. Kevin Campbell Agency, reinforcing its ongoing emphasis on...

headline: Brown & Brown (BRO) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback And Cooling Momentum
summary: Why Brown & Brown Is On Investors’ Radar Today Brown & Brown (BRO) is back in focus after recent trading left the shares with a month return near flat and a negative move over the past 3 months, prompting fresh interest in its valuation. See our latest analysis for Brown & Brown. At around US$80.64, Brown & Brown’s recent pullback, including a 14.65% 3 month share price return decline, sits against a 3 year total shareholder return of 34.23% and 5 year total shareholder return of 80.13%. This...
